name: Tetrogue Dragons
description: Enter the world of Tetrogue Dragons where arcade style gaming meets deckbuilding and roguelike dungeons. Choose your class, craft your deck, and battle your way to victory. Procedurally generated maps and unique classes ensure a different experience each time you embark on a new Tetrogue adventure. Choose between three unique classes and play the game to unlock four more! Each game will have different stackable items, potions and upgrades that add lots of replay value. Hone your skills and become a true master, or just play some casual games, it's up to you to decide!
